title: Play-Based Integrated English-Mathematics Educational Material Development Workshop for Elementary Parents in Their 40s

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience, with an understanding of elementary-level foundational math concepts (operations, measurement, geometry)
context.additional_context: Enhancing competencies in developing play-based learning materials optimized for smartphone-based microlearning environments. Applying a cross-curricular approach integrating English learning with math concepts (patterns, graphs, measurement).

learning_goals: Learners design smartphone-based English vocabulary learning materials utilizing gamification elements (scores, levels, rewards) and mathematical calculations (probability, score aggregation).
Learners create resources for practicing contextual English expressions and basic math problem-solving through 5-minute mobile quiz activities (multiple-choice/short-answer formats).
